Plugin Documentation

Goals available for this plugin:

GoalDescription
android-drawables:helpDisplay help information on android-drawables-maven-plugin.
Call 
  mvn android-drawables:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name>
to display parameter details.
android-drawables:rasterizeRasterizes any SVGs contained ${svgDirectory} (default: 'src/main/svg') to '${project.build.outputDirectory}/res' for any densities specified.
  • ldpi (default)
  • mdpi (default)
  • hdpi (default)
  • xhdpi (default)
  • nodpi
  • tvdpi
android-drawables:static-resourcesCopies all files with the extension ('.png', '.jpg', '.gif') from any defined resource directories to '${project.build.outputDirectory}/res'. Only files contained in the following directories will be considered:
  • ldpi
  • mdpi
  • hdpi
  • xhdpi
  • nodpi
  • tvdpi
Any files contained within sub directories of the above will have their name created from their path. For example /${subDir1}/${subDir2}/${imageFileName} will be named ${subDir1}_${subDir2}_${imageFileName}. All names will be in lower case.
android-drawables:unpackUnpack the bitmap resources contained in one or more 'android-drawables' artifacts.

System Requirements

The following specifies the minimum requirements to run this Maven plugin:

Maven[3.0.3,)
JDKDefault target for maven-compiler-plugin version 2.3.2
MemoryNo minimum requirement.
Disk SpaceNo minimum requirement.

Usage

You should specify the version in your project's plugin configuration:

<project>
  ...
  <build>
    <!-- To define the plugin version in your parent POM -->
    <pluginManagement>
      <plugins>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>com.github.kingamajick.admp</groupId>
          <artifactId>android-drawables-maven-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
        </plugin>
        ...
      </plugins>
    </pluginManagement>
    <!-- To use the plugin goals in your POM or parent POM -->
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>com.github.kingamajick.admp</groupId>
        <artifactId>android-drawables-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
      </plugin>
      ...
    </plugins>
  </build>
  ...
</project>

For more information, see "Guide to Configuring Plug-ins"
